website_summaries.verdict: A compact and economical donut maker that enables you to create up to four mini donuts at the same time.
pros: Comes with nonstick baking plates so dough won't stick to the inside of the plates
Power light blinks off to let you know when ready
Non-skid rubber feet and latching handle provide added convenience
cons: Produces donuts that are very small
Can be tough to evenly spread dough into the donut maker's baking plates

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to use this for my daughter’s birthday party ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to use this for my daughter’s birthday party and pulled it out of the box right when I received it. Unfortunately, the bottom heated up to scorching temperatures, while the top cooked along slowly. It ended up with burnt to crispy bottom halves and mushy tops. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Action Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very Different Product than Older Model
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this here on Amazon.com after I had borrowed my mom's older 6-donut maker. These donuts were very flat and did not cook as well as the older model. We ran the two units side by side for comparison. The wells for each donut is very shallow resulting in more of a flattened-donut shape rather than a tubular shape. Pretty disappointing. It works alright, although the finished product is not cooked as evenly as the older model.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hinckley

customer_reviews.title: One MILLION thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today, used tonight. Made the chocolate donuts from the recipe in the booklet, plus added a pinch of salt and a dash of cinnamon. Dusted with powdered sugar as they came out of the machine. My son gives it "one MILLION thumbs up." Tried piping it out of a plastic baggie, which, yes, was easier, but far messier to get it into the bag. May try mixing it in a Pyrex measuring cup with a pour spout next time. The donuts themselves are about the same diameter as Donettes, but not as thick or dense. Overall, well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Just excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this donut maker. I have been wanting mini grainfree pretty little sweets, donut looking sweets. I was shopping for a mini donut pan and this popped up on my search. I have 2 other Babycakes mini appliances and I adore them. They work as expected. This is my 2nd purchase. 1st one I used it and gifted it to my niece for her son since he’s grainfree...perfect portion size. I made a blended muffin recipe from instantloss.com it’s the ‘spiced apple blender muffins’. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Recipe: in place of the coconut oil I added ghee. Just because I like the buttery taste. Recipe makes 3 dozen little donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Rosen Dallas

customer_reviews.title: My 12-year-olds love this! We love making donuts with coconut flour ...
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-olds love this! We love making donuts with coconut flour with these because they come out soft and tasty without all the fat of being deep fried, and it's gluten free (for those who need it). Using regular flour is fine, but the texture is not as soft as fried dough of course. So that's why coconut flour works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Defective appliance base in an otherwise cute item
customer_reviews.text: I must have received a dud. It's cute and I followed directions. However it appears the bottom heater is not working. The donuts get done on top but the bottom is white. I called customer service. They were very polite and responsive and are sending me a new unit right away. I'll test that before changing my evaluation.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Harris

customer_reviews.title: This donut maker is awesome! My boyfriend loves donuts and this thing can ...
customer_reviews.text: This donut maker is awesome! My boyfriend loves donuts and this thing can make a ton of donuts in minutes. They are definitely small donuts. Highly recommend using a piping bag to fill when using.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lang

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Clean. Quickly Cooks Batter Evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly with cake batter. It takes around 4 minutes to cook the donuts just depends. Very easy and fun to use. The mini donuts come out perfect each time. It cooks them evenly in a short amount of time. There is no timer on this one but I just use my phone and see how long certain batter takes. This makes it easy to use next time since I know how long everything takes. Cleaning it up is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Hala

customer_reviews.title: Cooks unevenly.
customer_reviews.text: Followed recipie for sour cream donuts. Taste ok but cooks unevenly. Mostly left side donuts cooked a little better, while the right were undercooked. Initially we started with 4 minutes. I then thought maybe I didn't fill enough for tops to cook. Added more batter for second attempt and tried to leave them in longer, 6 minutes and they still did not cook correctly. Leaving them in longer also makes them flatten and dry tasting. After 5-6 attemps I gave up on this machine.
customer_reviews.author: SANDY C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Gluten Free Donuts
customer_reviews.text: My family is gluten free and are always asking for gluten free donuts. This donut maker is perfect. I remember my mom frying donuts on the stove and I did not want to go through that just to make gluten free donuts. I used the recipes in the manual and they work just fine with gluten free 1 for 1 flour and my family thinks they are tasty. The throughput is a little slow (4 mini donuts/4-5 min), but it is ok for a lazy Saturday or Sunday morning and just a few people to feed.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Easy-Perfect little donuts with a 4-year old!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Bought this to make vegan donuts with a 4 year old and they turned out perfect!!! Didn’t stick at all! Used a simple Oat flour based recipe off the internet. We overpoured the batter and it was easy to peel off the crusts, and still left perfect donuts. Took about 4 mins. I just eyeballed. *The only drawback is the cord is rather short (2ft est.) so if you don’t have an outlet right next to you, an extension cord may be helpful. *for those that said they turned out sticky or uneven. They probably needed a different recipe because these were so easy, and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute product
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased for myself but when I received the item, I realized it is better for new bakers or a family with small children. I purchased this item along with the mini donut maker. I gave them to my granddaughter because she loves to bake for her small girls. My granddaughter loves them. They are the perfect size for her two young daughters. I highly recommend these products. So easy to use and clean up. Very important when you are raising small children.
customer_reviews.author: D. Madewell

customer_reviews.title: ... Keto donuts in it and it was quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I made Keto donuts in it and it was quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Debs

customer_reviews.title: Took long time to make a dozen.
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what it say it is. Only reason I give it 4 stars is took me forever to make 12 pcs and it doesn’t take that great. And there is no timer on it so I don’t know when it actually done. But since I used it to make Pokémon for our Pokémon theme party final product came pretty but we didn’t end up eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Zin Linn

customer_reviews.title: followed the recipe and they were horrible.
customer_reviews.text: didn't work well at all. tiny donuts. followed the recipe and they were horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing... quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It makes 4 mini donuts in a matter of minutes and comes with a few different recipes. Will def buy again Great finger dessert for parties. Totally gonna give it for Christmas! Thanks amazon! I made 20 in about 30 minutes...including the food prep Amazing Love it
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my little baby cakes donut maker! Found out about this little gem from a blogger on Pinterest. With it being fall n all, I had a taste for pumpkin spice donuts - and Baby Cakes came through. Once I got the hang of it (the donut mix) it was easy to make - and quick! Can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Flb

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super simple to use and my doughnuts came out perfectly on the first try. I didn't spray oil or anything, and it didn't stick at all. So easy to clean. I used Kodiak cakes mix and it made perfect moist protein donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: The babycakes was missing one of the rubber foot pads from the bottom (see photo) i used pancake batter and used maple suryp as dipping sauce. The cooker worked good but missing the rubber foot made it awkward had to make a piece so it was not all tippy. Would be 5 stars if not for missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: JAY DAWGE

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my donut-loving child for her 7th birthday and it was a huge hit. I’m happy because the donuts are baked instead of fried. She has been happy with every recipe she has tried. It’s easy enough that she is able to make donuts as an after school activity with her grandma pretty often. The favorite so far is the applesauce one with maple frosting- everyone loved those!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Washock

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, offers great recipes/ideas, was a great gift! The donuts didn’t come out the prettiest, but not bad for homemade!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hackmann

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift and when we went to use it, it wouldn't even turn on. I plugged it in and the light didn't come on. I kept checking it to see if it was getting hot and it never did. Also, the plates on the inside are filled with bubbles. Overall this thing just seems like junk. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: randomreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and started making donuts in minutes. I had to adjust the cook time down to 2 minutes for my first recipe (found on pinterest) because the first batch was a little overcooked. Cooking time will depend on the recipe. The donuts were perfectly cooked and uniform. Big hit with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Christina K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun, easy to deal with, low maintenance product. It was a gift for my 10 year old who loves to bake. She also has the cake pop maker (same brand) which is also nice, but making cake pops always seems so time consuming. This is nice and quick, rather than a lengthy undertaking. I would definitely recommend, we're having fun with it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical that I could make homemade mini donuts in just 3 minutes...but it’s true! These bite size donuts are amazing and super simple to make worth little prep! We made our daughter birthday donuts for breakfast! Starting a new tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I just used cake mixes to make my mini donuts. Quick and easy and my granddaughter had a blast helping me make donuts.
customer_reviews.author: iceprincess2212

customer_reviews.title: My niece is over the moon about this donut maker
customer_reviews.text: I gave this donut maker to my niece for Christmas. She is 12 years old. She received the maker before the beginning of Christmas vacation so she decided to make donuts each morning before school started! Thanks for the recipes. They really helped to get her started.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Melinda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9 year old daughter and she cant stop using it. She has used 4 bags of flour creating her own doughnut recipes then she uses the neighborhood as her Guinea pigs
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Another major disappointment!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately broke my other mini donut maker. I had the BEST experience with it. Instructions, recipes, could put my own variations in. Quick back time. So I bought two of these, thinking they were the same, only larger. NOT SO MUCH!!!! Incredibly long cook time, smaller, shallow, didn't brown well, and didn't cook evenly. What a waste! and I have two of them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a GIRL
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this mini donut maker!! I made 1000 (I know) donuts for my little sisters gender reveal, and it was a complete success. Super fun to use, and very easy to use. My 7 year old even made about 50 herself. They came out so perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Howell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's soooo teeny tiny that cooking takes Forever to get a decent number of them. Also tends to be a little dry or overbaked at different times.
customer_reviews.author: egee

customer_reviews.title: Move over Easy Bake Oven!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my budding young chefs. Heats quickly and donuts (or bagels) slide right out. About 1/8 cup dry biscuit yields 4 mini donuts. Kids can whip up themselves in 10 minutes instead of cooking by lightbulb!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: great for small portions
customer_reviews.text: Handy for making small portion sizes. You will enjoy this cooker. Your kids will love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love . Takes a bit to get right amount for perfect donuts, but when you do, super
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Works just like a waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. Works just like a waffle iron. The little donuts come out so tiny and cute...and yummy too!
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making gluten free mini donuts!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mini donut maker to make GF donuts for my daughter’s 4th birthday. So easy to use and they turned out great!!! The only hard part is putting the right amount of dough in. 2 minutes and they were done! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NicoleA03

customer_reviews.title: Not really liking this
customer_reviews.text: It makes a really small portion but takes forever to make a batch. It will probably go to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Lid has to be held in one hand while working with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sumithra S.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: i've wish it include with a timer and the scoop with the exact mix amount to fill the mold, but once you figure out the right amount of mix and the right time, everything is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pancakes, too
customer_reviews.text: We received this item yesterday and decided it would be fun to make “donut” pancakes. We followed the directions on the pancake mix, and baked for 4 minutes. They came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Bite size donuts ! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The mini donuts are perfect if you want to portion control how much sugar you want to eat . Tried so many variations and everything turned out awesome
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Secret Santa Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend who absolutely loved it. I may purchase one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: JAY301

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute,cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, my granddaughter and I had fun making and eating these sweet little donuts. We dipped some in melted chocolate and some in powdered sugar. We had a fun day making memories. It only makes 4at a time, but it was time well spent. Very easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: mimi of 7

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. It is so fast and easy. Im gluten free and dairy free. I made delicious donuts to share. It took a few trials to get the hang of it but by round 3 we had perfect mini donuts which were fun to make.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Forster

customer_reviews.title: Finally gluten free donuts
customer_reviews.text: Being gluten-free has become easier with all the baking mixes that have come out. But sometimes I really miss donuts! This donut maker is perfect for making your own mini gf donuts. It is easy to clean and has a slim profile for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a recipe book that is super helpful, they were a big hit at the party I used it for. But it only makes four tiny donuts at a time so it might take a while to get through all the batter.
customer_reviews.author: Jamalyn

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Cutest mini doughnuts. We had a market day at school and my 4th grade girls cranked out 400 doughnuts over a two day period. All of them perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Williams-Powell

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free donuts are finally incredible
customer_reviews.text: Gluten free donuts Amazing to eat these tiny donuts. Even better after you chill them overnight. And they are so cute
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good for ketogenic donuts.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this donut maker while back when our family were on gluten free life style. I didn't have a chance to use it til right now - ketogenic diet. It's fun and fast. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Teadream

customer_reviews.title: very tiny, MINI
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a MINI, not bad, but going to give to my daughter. My protien donuts would take me hours to make in this, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlykay

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 recipes. All turned out the same. Flat on one side. I fill as much as possible without overflow and still flat. Not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a white elephant gift exchange. Everyone wanted it! Tried to get it for myself but was unsuccessful.... winner enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: Cocobv

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I found a yummy looking donut recipe online, and came to Amazon to find a donut pan. I found this instead, at about the same price. Bought it, and used it a ton this weekend. It is small, and makes 4 donuts at a time, but once it heats up, it bakes VERY quickly. I like that the donuts are baked, so it feels a lot healthier. I plan on making batches of donuts for parties and other events in this. The opportunities are endless... Product is a bit chintzy, if you hold it up and shake it, it may rattle a bit, but it was pretty inexpensive. Far exceeds expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love homemade donuts!
customer_reviews.text: Quick fast ,healther than store bought. These machines can take homemade batter, muffin mix or cake mixes so flavors and variety is endless
customer_reviews.author: Mary Steinfelt

customer_reviews.title: Cute but more like a toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute little donut maker but more like a toy than a real donut maker. They produce really small donuts. Both my 8 and 5 year old had fun with this. We used a box cake mix and it was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute little donuts
customer_reviews.text: Cooks beautifully, donuts done in 4 minutes, very tasty. My only problem with this machine is the lid doesn't want to stay opened ( or open very far), which is tricky when you are trying to fill those tiny little wells, especially the back ones. But overall we liked it.
customer_reviews.author: bluemom

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun but they just taste like dry pancakes no crunch on the outside. I used a good recipe I guess nothing compares to a good fried doughnut.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly

customer_reviews.title: They’re very delighted too!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and quick little donut maker. It was given to a family whose 4 children use it as part of their snack time projects. They’re very delighted too!
customer_reviews.author: Evelynda

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my mini donut cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making gluten-free donuts! Careful though, you may find these mouth-sized ... well, for some of us two bites ... minis hard to resist.
customer_reviews.author: RJA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this! Donuts came out so cute and it was easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a white elephant gift. Super cute and received it same day!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a fun White Elephant gift and stole it back for myself. =) Just made it batch they’re very tiny, Smaller than mini donuts from the store. Kind of a trial and error to get them right, but then again there are so many different recipes to follow, but it’s fun and easy to use, not the best donuts I’ve ever had but a good snack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy!!! We do keto donuts and they turned out perfect! Really small, but that was what we wanted!! You only need a bite!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Randall

customer_reviews.title: Works well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several months now and haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: 4kids1angel

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean up. Perfect for first time donut makers. Absolutely love!! Tip: I used a squeeze bottle to fill each donut for easy filling and no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids party!!
customer_reviews.text: My life saver for kids party!! It cooks so quick I tried their recipe and it turns out perfectly!!! My visitor loved it especially the kids cause its small and great (so cuute) for party!!
customer_reviews.author: Zzza

customer_reviews.title: Nicee
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it, his mom thought it was cute too definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This makes the most perfect mini donuts
customer_reviews.text: This makes the most perfect mini donuts, 4 at a time- smaller than I thought, but I like it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works great! Our donuts came out perfect and the machine was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Timtastic

customer_reviews.title: Forlorn Appliance Wasteland
customer_reviews.text: It’s amusing, once. Then takes up space in your pantry, forgotten and ignored.
customer_reviews.author: O'Vinyl

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for gluten free goodies!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once, but I made 50+ gluten free krispy kreme copycat donuts. It worked super well and it is a very easy to use machine. The cost for it wasn't too bad, the only thing I would prefer is more then just 4 donut baking containers. This just because I made so many at once and they were a smaller size. Other than that, I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was late, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Item works great. Delivery was late, came after Christmas and was intended to be a gift. Amazon Prime "promised" delivery before the holiday. It took a week to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Narotsky

customer_reviews.title: I hate headlines
customer_reviews.text: This thing feels like it’s made out of cardboard and spray painted yellow. You may be afraid to plug this in..
customer_reviews.author: Joe Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: doughnuts much smaller than expected. Works well and easy to clean. Would have been nice to get more recipes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerold L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cute appliance that we used for my daughter’s birthday party. Very user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Takes a while to make a batch due to only able to make 4 at a time
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: love love love the simplicity of use and being able to make little gluten free donuts for my wife is awesome 👌
customer_reviews.author: EastLosTraveLer

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto Donut maker!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that I was able to take a keto recipe and make minis. Super easy to use and the kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: fashion diva

customer_reviews.title: if making many you will have to let it cool down. Plus
customer_reviews.text: Product gets extremely hot and there's no simple way to remove the doughnuts, if making many you will have to let it cool down. Plus, I think it may even be smaller than the pictures can show..
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cute little gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little donut maker so much it was perfect for my sister
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Total junk
customer_reviews.text: The donuts are so tiny you can’t even eat them. Also the machine doesn’t make them good and there’s always extra residue. It’s total junk.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best gift!
customer_reviews.text: These donuts are so easy to make , are a huge hit and delicious! Unit is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: paul wilkowsky

customer_reviews.title: Mini Donut Maker - Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Product: Bought 2 months ago. Pros: Quick and easy baking. Fast clean-up. Makes more than just donuts. I use it to make bite-size muffins and cakes too. Cons: Much smaller than I thought it would be (donuts will be about the size of the vending machine packs). Rec?: Yes. I use it for pretty much all my baking now.
customer_reviews.author: black_eye

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and the donuts came out beautifully! Delicious recipes were included in the instruction packet, and the two dozen I’ve made so far are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute donuts
customer_reviews.text: This donut maker is lightweight, simple to use, makes great little donuts and is easy to store. The donuts are about three inches in width and bake quickly. The donut maker arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: David J Sims

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy.  Great little donuts!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mini donut maker. Makes four at a time so it takes some repeats to bake up a full batch of batter. But who cares? It's fun and cleanup is a cinch! It works perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids that love to bake!
customer_reviews.text: This little wonder is awesome for a good time with kids that love to bake! I paired this with a mini donut recipe book for a continuous good time with kids in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: History grad

customer_reviews.title: Fun, inexpensive and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Totally functional and serves its purpose for the great price point. Directions are a little vague/inaccurate for cooking times, etc., but we’ve developed our own system for perfect donuts!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Better than an easy bake for kids and fun for ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my 7 year old niece for Christmas and she loves it! Better than an easy bake for kids and fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it it makes beautiful mini donuts in just 3 minutes 🙌
customer_reviews.author: Amavizca

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says, fast!
customer_reviews.text: This mini donut maker does exactly what it is designed to do. It's small, easy to clean, and heats up quickly. I have read other reviews that complain about the smell, but to me it just smells like a hot griddle and I was not at all put off by it.
customer_reviews.author: JByrd

customer_reviews.title: Cute and tasty
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is gluten free but was still able to use the recipe just substituting some items with gluten free options. Donuts came out great and she was able to do it all by herself. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Tiny donuts!
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! It's makes tiny donuts but it's fine just to fun :🤣
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Babycakes Donut Maker, Mini
product_meta.description: The Babycakes mini donut maker makes 4 mini donuts in just minutes. Breakfast is more fun and delicious with this handy Product. It features a latching handle and non-stick baking plates, as well as non-skid rubber feet and a convenient cord wrap. Simply wipe it out after use for quick and easy clean-up.
feature_bullets: Latching handle and non-skid rubber feet
